author: Rhea Mahbubani
title: Panic attacks, dreams on hold, and depression: 3 Italian women describe what a month under coronavirus lockdown looks like
description: Francesca Pelucchini, of Bologna, believes that leaders should have shut down things much earlier. "But that didn't happen, so we all have to learn to live with it now." She and two other Italian women told Business Insider about their "new normal," and how t…
content:
When the coronavirus first breached Italy, Cinzia Bruzzese and her friends discussed the pandemic and its effects on life as they knew it. 
In the nearly one month since being on lockdown, that chatter has ground to a halt, the Bologna resident said.
